description:
Request for Scoping Opinion regarding the scope of the
Environmental Impact Assessment to be undertaken in
relation to the site known as Phase 3 within the
Woodberry Down Masterplan area for: Demolition of
existing buildings on site and the provision of
approximately 58,300sqm GEA of new development
(across 2.2ha), with the quantum of floorspace, by land
use, as follows: A1-A4 Retail (up to 1,300 sqm GEA), B1
Commercial (up to 1,300 sqm GEA), C3 Residential
(57,000 sqm GEA (comprising circa 581 dwellings), D1
Education, healthcare and community facilities (up to
1,300 sqm GEA). The development will also provide
associated open space (including a new public park of
approximately 0.58 hectares) and landscaping; a
minimum of 48 residential car parking spaces, on-street
car parking spaces, including for non-residential uses,
and cycle storage; pedestrian, cycle and vehicle access;
highway works; and associated infrastructure, including
water attenuation tanks, an energy centre and the
diversion of any utilities and services to accommodate
the development.
ward:
Within Hackney (near Highbury West Ward)
Within Hackney (near Mildmay Ward)
